series_description: This series documents appeal decisions issued by a special examiner when a lower authority decision of unemployment compensation claims has been appealed. This series may include, but is not limited to:notice of appeals, notice of letter of appeal, numbered exhibits, and decisions/orders from court systems.

This series documents first-level appeals of unemployment compensation claims and the appeal examiner's decision. This series may include, but is not limited to: notice of appeals, notice of hearing, letter of appeal, and numbered exhibits.
